channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Hyper-V
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Hyper-V

item.title: CVE-2017-0212|2024-08-05T12:55:19.135Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20hyper-v
item.description: Windows Hyper-V allows an elevation of privilege vulnerability when Microsoft Windows 10 Gold, 1511, 1607, and 1703, and Windows Server 2016 fail to properly validate vSMB packet data, aka "Windows Hyper-V vSMB Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability".
